paper_best_features: Best reported uses all feature types: siRNA seq, mRNA seq, RNA-FM embeddings, TD parameters
input_lengths: siRNA 19 nt (TD uses first 19); mRNA is extended target 57 nt (paper window)
expected_vs_actual_lengths: expected: siRNA 19, mRNA 57; actual: siRNA 19, mRNA 57
orientation: siRNA antisense (guide) as provided; mRNA target contains reverse complement
required_inputs: CSV: siRNA, extended_mRNA, efficacy (optional binary); RNA-FM embeddings generated in prepare

paper_best_features: siRNA 3-mer counts, mRNA 4-mer counts, 22 thermo features (RNAup/ViennaRNA) on interaction node
input_lengths: siRNA 19 nt; mRNA length varies in paper (full transcripts); current data mRNA length 57
expected_vs_actual_lengths: expected: siRNA 19, mRNA full-length; actual: siRNA 19, mRNA 57
orientation: siRNA antisense as provided; RNAup uses reverse complement vs mRNA
required_inputs: CSV: siRNA, extended_mRNA, efficacy; processed dir with k-mers + thermo (RNAup)

mismatches: Paper expects full-length mRNA; we use 57-nt target window.

paper_best_features: one-hot + positional encoding (dmodel=6) + thermo + co-fold + self-fold + AGO2 + GC + 1-5 mer + rules scores; reduced matrices dims mRNA=100, siRNA=6, pair=50

paper_best_features: RNA-FM embeddings of 21-nt antisense + 59-nt local mRNA (binding site +/-20) + prior-knowledge features: thermo (20), k-mer 1-3 (84), PSSM (1), secondary structure (3), GC content + max GC stretch (2); total feature vec 253
input_lengths: AS 19 nt (paper uses 21); local mRNA 57 nt (paper uses 59)
expected_vs_actual_lengths: expected: AS 19, local mRNA 57; actual: siRNA 19, mRNA 57
orientation: AS (siRNA) antisense; mRNA local target window around binding site
required_inputs: CSV: siRNA, extended_mRNA, efficacy; optional s-Biopredsi/DSIR/i-score (filled 0.0 if missing); RNA-FM embeddings generated in prepare
paper_best_params: Adam weight_decay=5e-4, lr=0.005, max_epoch=1000, early_stop=20 on PCC, loss=MSE; TransformerEncoder d_model=16, layers=4, heads=2; FC 256-64-16-1
mismatches: Paper uses 21/59; we use 19/57 and resize embeddings/model accordingly.
